item.title: Datto SaaS Protection - Application Maintenance For Australia Region
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Routine Maintenance for Datto SaaS Protection in Australia Region

We will be performing routine maintenance to Datto SaaS Protection in the Australia region on March 19th, 2024. This may cause an impact to systems and related services for an estimated 8 hours.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 19, 14:00 - 22:00 UTC

Mar 8, 13:49 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing a routine maintenance to Datto SaaS Protection in the Australia region on March 19th 2024, starting at 2:00PM UTC for an estimated 8 hours.



During this downtime you may experience an impact to systems and related services to Datto SaaS Protection.



Subscribe to receive up-to-date notifications on future maintenance periods by visiting status.datto.com

item.content:encoded:

During this period, there may be an impact on systems and related services to Datto SaaS Protection.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 UTC  -  Mar 15, 03:00 UTC

Mar 8, 13:47 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing a routine maintenance to Datto SaaS Protection in the Germany region on March 14th 2024, starting at 7:00PM UTC for an estimated 8 hours.



During this downtime you may experience an impact to systems and related services to Datto SaaS Protection.



Subscribe to receive up-to-date notifications on future maintenance periods by visiting status.datto.com

item.title: Datto SaaS Protection - Unable To Access Clients On UK Node Gbe2-bfyii-2928
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Backup Failures and Access Issues in UK Region

Our Engineering team is currently investigating a problem causing backup failures and issues accessing clients for Datto SaaS Protection users in the UK region. It is affecting the gbe2-bfyii-2928 node. Users are advised to subscribe to Datto SaaS Protection on the Status Page for up-to-date information.

Mar 7, 15:56 UTC
Investigating - We are currently aware of a problem where Datto SaaS Protection users in the UK region can experience backup failures and issues accessing clients on gbe2-bfyii-2928.


Our Engineering team is investigating the problem and is working towards a resolution.


Affected Node :


1. gbe2-bfyii-2928


Unsure of which node or pod you are on? We have a Knowledge Base article to walk you through determining your node or pod:

https://saasprotection.datto.com/help/M365/Content/Troubleshooting/General/KB3600004035831.html?Highlight=how%20do%20I%20check%20where%20my%20cloud%20data%20is%20stored


Subscribe to Datto SaaS Protection on the Status Page for up to date information.


You can monitor the current status of this issue at https://status.datto.com/

item.title: Datto RMM - Autotask ticketing feature within Web Remote is undergoing maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Autotask Ticketing Feature Undergoing Maintenance Summary: The Autotask ticketing feature within the Web Remote application is currently undergoing maintenance, which may result in temporary unavailability. The feature will be re-activated upon completion of the maintenance. [High] - Autotask Ticketing Feature Re-enabled After Maintenance Summary: The Autotask ticketing feature has been re-enabled on all accounts across all platforms following the completion of the maintenance.

Mar 7, 12:17 UTC
Resolved - The Autotask ticketing feature has been re-enabled on all accounts across all platforms with the completion of the 12.8.0 release cycle.

Jan 27, 02:34 UTC
Monitoring - The Autotask ticketing feature within the Web Remote application is currently undergoing maintenance. The feature will be re-activated upon completion of the Maintenance.

item.title: Datto Partner Portal - Various functions related to creating/modifying Users and Organizations are Failing
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Platform Outage

Summary: We are currently investigating a major platform issue that is causing downtime for our users. We suspect it may be due to a recent configuration change.

Mar 5, 20:08 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: PSA - 2024.1.2 - Versión secundaria del PSA - Spanish (Español)
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Outage for PSAN Maintenance

The scheduled maintenance is for implementing a secondary version with bug fixes, and may result in brief session closures for partners. There is a link provided for the list of tickets corrected with this version.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 5, 19:00 - 21:00 UTC

Mar 4, 19:34 UTC
Scheduled - Tipo de mantenimiento: Versión secundaria del PSA

Número de la versión: 2024.1.2

Propósito: Esta es la implementación de una versión secundaria que incluye correcciones de errores.

Impacto: Es posible que se cierre brevemente la sesión de los socios durante esta ventana.

Vínculo a la lista de tickets corregidos con esta versión:
https://community.kaseya.com/help-learning/discussion/comment/196153#Comment_196153

item.title: Datto Workplace - CA3 - Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Infrastructure Maintenance and Service Disruption Summary: During the scheduled maintenance, there will be a significant impact on the platform, including the unavailability of search and file conversion features.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 4, 14:00 UTC  -  Mar 5, 20:00 UTC

Mar 4, 10:07 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing infrastructure maintenance during this time.

During the window Search and File Conversion encompassing displaying thumbnails and file previews will be unavailable.

item.title: Datto RMM - Syrah, Zinfandel - Isolated issue with Grouped Filters following the 12.8.0 Release
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Configuration Change Causing Unintended Side Effect on Filters

The recent configuration change to resolve an issue with Grouped Filters has caused an unintended side effect on Filters already in place for certain platforms. This affected the 12.8.0 version of Datto RMM in specific regions. The R&D Team has reverted the change and will address the original issue in the future. We apologize for any inconvenience. Summary: A configuration change intended to resolve an issue with Grouped Filters caused unintended side effects on existing filters in certain regions using the 12.8.0 version of Datto RMM. The change has since been reverted, and the original issue will be addressed in the future. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Mar 1, 19:12 UTC
Resolved - We have been made aware that a change intended to resolve an issue with Grouped Filters had an unintended side effect on Filters already in place using certain criteria on platforms currently on the 12.8.0 version of Datto RMM (Zinfandel - US West and Syrah - APAC regions).

The R&D Team has reverted this change and will look to address the original issue in the future.

We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience

item.title: Datto RMM - Zinfandel - Intermittent Page Loading Failures
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Intermittent Page Loading Failures and 50x Errors on Zinfandel

Our teams are continuing to investigate reports of intermittent page loading failures and 50x errors on Zinfandel. Thank you for your patience! Summary: The company is experiencing intermittent page loading failures and 50x errors on the Zinfandel platform, indicating a major outage and potential platform downtime.

Mar 1, 19:03 UTC
Identified - Our teams are continuing to investigate reports of intermittent page loading failures and 50x errors on Zinfandel.

Thank you for your patience!

item.title: Datto RMM - Zinfandel, Syrah - Pages fail to load intermittently
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Pages Failing to Load in Datto RMM Zinfandel and Syrah Platforms

Our teams are currently investigating reports of pages failing to load in the New UI for our Datto RMM Zinfandel and Syrah Platforms. Thank you for your patience! Summary: Investigating reports of pages failing to load in the New UI for our Datto RMM Zinfandel and Syrah Platforms.

Feb 29, 15:14 UTC
Investigating - Our teams are currently investigating reports of pages failing to load in the New UI for our Datto RMM Zinfandel and Syrah Platforms.

Thank you for your patience!

item.title: Datto RMM - Zinfandel - Intermittent Failure To Load Web UI Pages
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Datto RMM Web Portal Intermittent Loading Issue

Our teams are currently investigating an issue where pages in the Datto RMM web portal intermittently fail to load on Zinfandel. Initial reports suggest attempts to refresh the page may bypass the issue, but our teams are investigating the root cause. Thank you for your patience! Summary: Investigating intermittent page loading issues on Datto RMM web portal, refresh may bypass the problem.

Feb 28, 19:51 UTC
Investigating - Our teams are currently investigating an issue where pages in the Datto RMM web portal intermittently fail to load on Zinfandel. Initial reports suggest attempts to refresh the page may bypass the issue, but our teams are investigating the root cause.

Thank you for your patience!

item.title: Datto SaaS Protection - Service Degradation In AUE Region For M365 Services
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Service Degradation in M365 Pod0, AUE region Summary: The Engineering team is investigating a problem causing service degradation on M365 services in pod0, AUE region. This incident is being treated as a critical issue.

Feb 28, 13:18 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 22, 16:26 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 20, 14:19 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 16, 19:27 UTC
Investigating - We are currently aware of a problem where M365 services are experiencing service degradation on pod0 in the AUE region.



Our Engineering team is investigating the issue and is working towards a resolution.



Affected Pod :

1. aue1-pod-0



Unsure of which node or pod you are on? We have a Knowledge Base article to walk you through determining your node or pod: https://saasprotection.datto.com/help/M365/Content/Troubleshooting/General/KB3600004035831.html?Highlight=how%20do%20I%20check%20where%20my%20cloud%20data%20is%20stored



Subscribe to Datto SaaS Protection on the Status Page for up to date information.



You can monitor the current status of this issue at https://status.datto.com/

item.title: Datto SaaS Protection - M365 Teams Backup Failures Due To API Throttling
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - M365 Teams Services Throttling Issue

Engineering team has adjusted backend configurations to mitigate Microsoft throttling impacting M365 Teams Services causing backups to fall behind. Monitoring is ongoing.

Feb 26, 14:39 UTC
Monitoring - We are currently aware of a problem where M365 Teams Services can experience Microsoft throttling and cause backups to fall behind.



Our Engineering team has identified the problem and has adjusted backend configurations to mitigate the impact of Microsoft throttling.



Unsure of which node or pod you are on? We have a Knowledge Base article to walk you through determining your node or pod:

https://saasprotection.datto.com/help/M365/Content/Troubleshooting/General/KB3600004035831.html?Highlight=how%20do%20I%20check%20where%20my%20cloud%20data%20is%20stored



Subscribe to Datto SaaS Protection on the Status Page for up to date information.



You can monitor the current status of this issue at https://status.datto.com/

Feb 6, 14:49 UTC

During this downtime you may experience an impact to systems and related services to Off-site Synchronization and Cloud Restore options



Subscribe to receive up-to-date notifications on future maintenance periods by visiting status.datto.com

item.title: PSA - UK2 - Outage for Migration
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 23, 21:00 UTC  -  Feb 24, 03:00 UTC

Feb 8, 07:57 UTC
Scheduled - Purpose: Autotask will be migrating to a new data center during the month of February 2024. We are excited to announce that this is a proactive move to upgrade to the latest infrastructure which will allow us to provide you with faster, more secure, and more reliable service.

Impact: When the zone in which your tenant is hosted is being migrated, the Autotask platform will be unavailable and you will not be able to access any of the services provided by Autotask including LiveMobile, API access (including integrations built by third-party vendors), data warehouse, as well as any other auxiliary components.

Please refer to the following community link for more details:
https://community.kaseya.com/help-learning/discussion/69108/notice-for-upcoming-autotask-uk-data-center-migration

item.content:encoded:

In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 8, 07:57 UTC
Scheduled - Purpose: Autotask will be migrating to a new data center during the month of February 2024. We are excited to announce that this is a proactive move to upgrade to the latest infrastructure which will allow us to provide you with faster, more secure, and more reliable service.

Impact: When the zone in which your tenant is hosted is being migrated, the Autotask platform will be unavailable and you will not be able to access any of the services provided by Autotask including LiveMobile, API access (including integrations built by third-party vendors), data warehouse, as well as any other auxiliary components.

Please refer to the following community link for more details:
https://community.kaseya.com/help-learning/discussion/69108/notice-for-upcoming-autotask-uk-data-center-migration

item.title: Datto SaaS Protection - Application Maintenance For Canada East Region
item.content:encoded:
Feb 22, 21:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 22, 20:40 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing routine application maintenance to Datto SaaS Protection on February 22 2024 starting at 9:00PM UTC until February 27 2024.



During this downtime you may experience an impact to systems and related services to Datto SaaS Protection.



Affected Pod : 1. cae1-bfyii-308



Unsure of which node or pod you are on? We have a Knowledge Base article to walk you through determining your node or pod: https://saasprotection.datto.com/help/M365/Content/Troubleshooting/General/KB3600004035831.html?Highlight=how%20do%20I%20check%20where%20my%20cloud%20data%20is%20stored



Subscribe to receive up-to-date notifications on future maintenance periods by visiting status.datto.com
